unnormalised: Breaking news! A massive fire broke out earlier today at a residential complex in Andheri West, Mumbai. The incident occurred at 'Sunshine Apartments', located at Flat no. 203, 2nd Floor, Lokhandwala Complex, Andheri West, Mumbai, MH, 400053.
normalised: Breaking news! A massive fire broke out earlier today at a residential complex in Andheri West, Mumbai. The incident occurred at 'Sunshine Apartments', located at Flat number two hundred and three, second Floor, Lokhandwala Complex, Andheri West, Mumbai, M-H, four hundred thousand and fifty three.

unnormalised: Initial reports suggest the fire started around 10:30 AM IST. While the cause is still under investigation, early speculation points to a possible electrical short circuit. Thankfully, residents of Flat no. 203 and neighboring units were quickly evacuated.
normalised: Initial reports suggest the fire started around ten thirty A-M I-S-T. While the cause is still under investigation, early speculation points to a possible electrical short circuit. Thankfully, residents of Flat number two hundred and three and neighboring units were quickly evacuated.

unnormalised: Firefighters from the Mumbai Fire Brigade, stationed at Juhu Road, were on the scene within minutes. They managed to contain the blaze before it spread to other buildings. We heard from a resident, Priya Sharma, who lives at Bldg 5, Apt 101, Seven Bungalows, Andheri (W), her description of the chaotic scene was vivid!
normalised: Firefighters from the Mumbai Fire Brigade, stationed at Juhu Road, were on the scene within minutes. They managed to contain the blaze before it spread to other buildings. We heard from a resident, Priya Sharma, who lives at Building five, Apartment one hundred and one, Seven Bungalows, Andheri West, her description of the chaotic scene was vivid!

unnormalised: As of 1:00 PM, the fire has been extinguished. Officials are still assessing the damage. Reports indicate that flat number 203 sustained significant damage. More updates to follow. You can reach the Andheri Police Station for information at S.V.P. Nagar Police Station, Four Bungalows, Andheri West, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400053.
normalised: As of one P-M, the fire has been extinguished. Officials are still assessing the damage. Reports indicate that flat number two hundred and three sustained significant damage. More updates to follow. You can reach the Andheri Police Station for information at S-V-P Nagar Police Station, Four Bungalows, Andheri West, Mumbai, Maharashtra four hundred thousand and fifty three.
